system.description: Allows the character to look for “beggars’ signs” (Gaunerzinken), hidden signs left behind by travellers to warn of danger, inform others of a generous host, mark a safe camping site, and so on. Civilised areas have signs with a 1:2 probability; semi-civilised ones with 1:3, and wilderness with a 1:6. The character must be actively looking for beggars’ signs to find them (i.e. make a skill check).
